item.title: Bertrand Russell on Thought

item.title: Things about me
item.description: I have made several bookdown projects to collect what I have learned and thoughts inspired by some excellent data science resources. As of yet most of them are written in Chinese, but I have decided to make English learning notes more often. https://bookdown.org/Maxine/rfordatascience/ : Notes for R for Data Science by Hadley Wickham and Garret Grolemund. Topics covered in the original book are fairly reproduced and explored, and I now start to venture new topics based on some nice R packages I discoverd, as well as update some content to keep it in line with the newest Tidyverse
